description: Llangattock Hours; Willem Vrelant (Flemish, died 1481, active 1454 - 1481), Master of the Llangattock Hours (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460), Master of the Llangattock Epiphany (Flemish, active about 1450 - 1460), et al; Ghent (bound), Belgium; 1450 to 1459; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment bound between wood boards covered with original brown calf; Leaf: 26.4 × 18.4 cm (10 3/8 × 7 1/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig IX 7; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
